introduction: Zamar Jamar, Developer Relations Manager at Latin NVIDIA, shares insights on how to accelerate AI applications using NVIDIA SDK. He discusses the importance of NVIDIA's ecosystem of developers, startups, and software partners, and how NVIDIA offers pre-trained models and NEMO Guard RAOS for chatbots to ensure safety and security. He also introduces the ISAC robotics platform for developing AI and hardware in parallel, and the Omniverse platform for collaboration and simulation in the next era of innovation. The video covers topics such as AI tools and software, use cases, and the importance of simulation in the development process. The speaker also mentions the NVIDIA on-demand portal for accessing content and learning about NVIDIA tools and software.

sections.title: Section 1: Introduction
content: Zamar Jamar, Developer Relations Manager at Latin NVIDIA, is here to share insights on how to accelerate AI applications using NVIDIA SDK.
NVIDIA has more software engineers than hardware engineers, and their ecosystem of developers, startups, and software partners is crucial for the growth of their AI capabilities.
NVIDIA offers pre-trained models and NEMO Guard RAOS for chatbots to ensure safety and security in AI applications.
The ISAC robotics platform allows for the development of AI and hardware in parallel, making the development process more efficient.

sections.title: Section 2: NVIDIA's Ecosystem
content: NVIDIA's ecosystem of developers, startups, and software partners is essential for the growth of their AI capabilities.
NVIDIA has more software engineers than hardware engineers, which highlights the importance of software development in AI.
The ecosystem enables NVIDIA to accelerate their AI capabilities by leveraging the expertise of their partners.
The ecosystem also allows for the creation of innovative AI applications that can be scaled to meet the needs of various industries.

sections.title: Section 3: Pre-Trained Models and NEMO Guard RAOS
content: NVIDIA offers pre-trained models that can be easily integrated into AI applications.
The pre-trained models are based on the key and most important architecture used today for neural networks.
NEMO Guard RAOS is an open-source platform that ensures the safety and security of chatbots.
NEMO Guard RAOS limits the application to answer specific topics, preventing hallucinations and executing third-party calls.

sections.title: Section 4: ISAC Robotics Platform
content: The ISAC robotics platform allows for the development of AI and hardware in parallel.
The platform consists of a simulation component, a key SDK training component, and a deployment part.
The simulation component enables developers to import projects and create a virtual world for the robot to operate in.
The platform streamlines the development process by allowing developers to test and deploy their AI applications in a single system.

sections.title: Section 5: Omniverse Platform
content: The Omniverse platform is the next era of collaboration and simulation in the development of AI applications.
The platform enables developers to create digital twins of various systems and simulate their behavior.
The platform also allows for the creation of avatar technology and digital twins of servers.
The Omniverse platform is essential for the development of AI applications in various industries, including gaming, healthcare, and autonomous vehicles.
topics: Next Era of Collaboration and Simulation
